languages.text: {n}Друкари бросает на вас тяжелый взгляд.{/n} "Ты мне тоже, {name}".
{n}The Drukhari glowers at you.{/n} "So is keeping you, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари бросает на вас тяжелый взгляд.{/n} "Ты мне тоже, {name}".

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari vous lance un regard noir.{/n} « Tout comme vous, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari glowers at you.{/n} "So is keeping you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari vous lance un regard noir.{/n} « Tout comme vous, {name}. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋怒视着你。{/n}“呆在你这里也一样麻烦，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari glowers at you.{/n} "So is keeping you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋怒视着你。{/n}“呆在你这里也一样麻烦，{name}。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}デュカーリはあなたをにらみつけた。{/n}「それは俺のセリフだぞ、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari glowers at you.{/n} "So is keeping you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリはあなたをにらみつけた。{/n}「それは俺のセリフだぞ、{name}」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari sieht dich grimmig an.{/n} "Wie mit Euch, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari glowers at you.{/n} "So is keeping you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Drukhari sieht dich grimmig an.{/n} "Wie mit Euch, {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari te mira con el ceño fruncido.{/n} «Lo mismo te digo, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari glowers at you.{/n} "So is keeping you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Drukhari te mira con el ceño fruncido.{/n} «Lo mismo te digo, {name}».

languages.text: {n}Drukhari sana ters ters bakıyor.{/n} "Senin benim yanımda olman da bana {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari glowers at you.{/n} "So is keeping you, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari sana ters ters bakıyor.{/n} "Senin benim çevremde olman da {name}."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
